content.description: The following question is based on an excerpt of music that consists of an instrumental introduction followed by a passage for chorus and orchestra.
content.question: At the end of the excerpt, the chordal seventh and its resolution at the cadence are in which voice?

unit.text: 4: Harmony and Voice Leading I - Chord Function, Cadence, and Phrase

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in performed music.
